_header: O Jesu our redemption and why
_description: A prayer to Jesus, four stanzas rhyme royal, written without breaks for stanzas.

BLAdd18632.First Lines:
O ihesu oure redempcioun and whyfor þou hast a yein bouht
                    vsOure desirous loue & nat oonlyof vs but of oure olde fadres
                    seying þisShal I þe nat se shal I nat dure trowest lord
                    ihesusÞou I sey god maker of alle þinges tame & rageman
                    bi comen in the laste ageWhat mekenesse haþ venquisshid
                    þethat is to sey after the glose…
BLAdd18632.Last Lines:
…& make vs of desire miȝti bi þi gracein þi
                    presence to se þe face to face
